conversation.content: Good afternoon. I need to dispute a charge on my account from your company, please.
Good afternoon and thank you for calling. I'll be happy to assist you with that dispute today. May I have your account number or the email address associated with your account?
My email is sarah.martinez at oceanview dot com. The charge is from November third.
Thank you, Ms. Martinez. I've located your account ending in -8274. I can see a charge from November 3rd for $189.99. Could you tell me more about why you're disputing this particular transaction?
I ordered one certification course for forty-nine dollars. You charged me for a premium package I never selected.

I understand your concern completely. Let me review your order details here. I can see order number ORD-11032024-MTZ showing an initial selection of our Basic Lifeguard Recertification course at $49.00.
Exactly. That's all I ordered. Please explain why I was charged nearly four times that amount.

I'm reviewing the transaction history now. It appears that on November 3rd at 2:47 PM, the system processed an upgrade to our Premium Package PRM-LG500. Let me investigate further to understand how this occurred.
I never authorized any upgrade. I specifically chose the basic option and confirmed it twice.

I completely understand your frustration, and I apologize for this error. According to our records, there's no confirmation click-through for the upgrade, which indicates this was likely a system processing error on our end.
Good. What are the next steps to get this corrected and receive my refund?
Absolutely. I'm initiating a partial refund of $140.99 right now, which is the difference between the premium package and your intended purchase. Your refund reference number is RFN-2024-11-18-SMZ.
Thank you. How long will it take to see this refund on my credit card?
The refund will be processed within 24 hours on our end. Depending on your card issuer, you should see the credit appear within 3 to 5 business days, no later than November 25th.
I appreciate that. Will I still have access to the basic certification course I originally wanted?

Yes, absolutely. I'm adjusting your account right now to reflect the Basic Lifeguard Recertification access. You'll receive a confirmation email within the next 10 minutes to sarah.martinez at oceanview dot com.
Perfect. Can you also send documentation about this dispute resolution for my records?

Certainly. I'm preparing a detailed dispute resolution letter with case number DSP-181124-7294. This document will include all transaction details, the refund amount, and expected timeline. You'll receive this within the hour.
Excellent. Thank you for resolving this so quickly. I was nervous about disputing this charge.

You're very welcome, Ms. Martinez. You handled this perfectly, and I'm glad we could resolve it promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with regarding your account or certification access today?

scenario: lifeguard, young and nervous about disputing a charge for the first time ever
